Key.name: 8: norden
Key.script:
local direction="norden" local room=gmcp.MG.room.info
raiseEvent("movedirection", room, direction) send(direction)

Key.name: Strg+8: nordunten
Key.script:
local direction="nordunten" local room=gmcp.MG.room.info
raiseEvent("movedirection", room, direction) send(direction)

Key.name: Alt+8: nordoben
Key.script:

raiseEvent("movedirection", room, direction) send(direction)

Key.name: /: kurz
Key.script:
local newmodus = ""
if ME.modus == "lang" then newmodus = "kurz" elseif ME.modus == "kurz" then newmodus = "ultrakurz" elseif ME.modus == "ultrakurz" then newmodus = "lang" else newmodus = "kurz" end
ME.modus = newmodus send(newmodus)
